data.comment: There are 9287 people in the crowd for today's match.
The match is underway in Krasnodar.
Ball safe as Tambov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Tambov throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Krasnodar.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
In the minute 7, Krasnodar surge into the attack at Krasnodar Stadium but Aleksandr Martynovich’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Tambov at Krasnodar Stadium.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
In the minute 9, Tambov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Krasnodar are in shooting range from this free kick.
Can Krasnodar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tambov's half?
Krasnodar push forward at Krasnodar Stadium and Shapi Suleymanov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tambov defence.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
Shapi Suleymanov (Krasnodar) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Tambov.
Remy Cabella is on target to give Krasnodar a 1-0 advantage.
Great play from Viktor Claesson to set up the goal.
In the minute 22, Tambov drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
In the minute 26, In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Shapi Suleymanov of Krasnodar smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Tambov a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Vitali Shakhov is back on the pitch.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Vitali Shakhov for Tambov who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Free kick Tambov.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 32, Egor Sorokin is booked for the home team.
Free kick for Tambov in the half of Krasnodar.
Alexey Ionov (Krasnodar) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 34, Tambov's Aleksandre Karapetian gets in a shot on goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
In the minute 35, Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oleksandr Kaplienko (Tambov) has received a first yellow card.
In Krasnodar, Shapi Suleymanov of Krasnodar is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 38, Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Attention is being given to Tambov’s Oleksandr Kaplienko and play has been suspended briefly.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Oleksandr Kaplienko for Tambov is back on the field again.
In the minute 39, Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Krasnodar drives forward and Shapi Suleymanov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 41, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Tambov.
In the minute 44, Throw-in Krasnodar.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Krasnodar's Igor Smolnikov breaks free at Krasnodar Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Tambov at Krasnodar Stadium.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Krasnodar Stadium.
Mikhail Kostyukov is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Mikhail Kostyukov is back on his feet again.
In the minute 49, Tambov will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Krasnodar.
Tambov's Varazdat Haroyan has been booked in Krasnodar.
Krasnodar's Remy Cabella gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tambov defender.
In the minute 50, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Tambov's half.
Throw-in for Tambov at Krasnodar Stadium.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 52, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tambov close to the penalty box.
Aleksandr Martynovich for Krasnodar has been booked by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin and receives a first yellow card.
Tambov are coming forward and Valeriu Ciuperca gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
In Krasnodar Krasnodar drive forward through Yuri Gazinskiy. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Shapi Suleymanov for Krasnodar drives towards goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, In Krasnodar Tambov's Mikhail Kostyukov is caught offside.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
At Krasnodar Stadium, Mikhail Kostyukov has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 59, Krasnodar's Daniil Utkin is on target but unsuccessful.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Red card in Krasnodar! Egor Sorokin has been shown a second yellow card by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
In the minute 62, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
Free kick Krasnodar.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Tambov.
Varazdat Haroyan has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Daniil Utkin gets his shot on target but fails to score for Krasnodar.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Krasnodar.
In the minute 67, Cristian Ramirez is replacing Igor Smolnikov for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Krasnodar make their second substitution with Kristoffer Olsson replacing Viktor Claesson.
Ruslan Kambolov is replacing Daniil Utkin for the home team.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Ruslan Kambolov (Krasnodar) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Tambov.
In the minute 71, Aleksey Rybin (Tambov) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Yuri Gazinskiy for Krasnodar gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Tambov at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 74, In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Krasnodar Tambov attack through Mikhail Kostyukov. The finish is off target, however.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, The home team replace Shapi Suleymanov with Ari.
Krasnodar's Remy Cabella has run offside.
Murad Olegovich Musaev (Krasnodar) is making a fifth substitution, with Tonny Vilhena replacing Yuri Gazinskiy.
In the minute 77, Krasnodar's Tonny Vilhena gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Krasnodar.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Anton Kilin is on a sub for Aleksey Rybin for Tambov.
Free kick Krasnodar.
In the minute 79, Aleksey Gritsaenko (Tambov) has received a first yellow card.
Remy Cabella is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Krasnodar’s Remy Cabella is on his feet again at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 81, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Tambov a goal kick.
In Krasnodar Tambov attack through Mikhail Kostyukov. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
In the minute 82, In Krasnodar Krasnodar drive forward through Alexey Ionov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
In Krasnodar, Aleksandre Karapetian (Tambov) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the home team in Krasnodar.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Ball safe as Tambov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 87, In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Vladimir Kabakhidze is replacing Valeriu Ciuperca for the away team.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
In the minute 89, Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Tambov have a goal kick.
Free kick for Tambov in the half of Krasnodar.
Krasnodar's Ari gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Tambov at Krasnodar Stadium.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
Krasnodar's Cristian Ramirez has been booked in Krasnodar and will miss the next match through suspension.
